replies.author: LRual
replies.txt_content:
手残党一脸懵逼
表示，只会用WE的路过
附赠WE树干指令一枚：//g -h log (0.5+sin(atan2(x,z)*8)*0.2)*(sqrt(x*x+z*z)/0.5)^(-2)-1.2 < y
